thread.title: 'Scream Queens' 1.07 Preview Teases Ariana Grande's Return
thread.title_full: 'Scream Queens' 1.07 Preview Teases Ariana Grande's Return

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Scream Queens' 1.07 Preview Teases Ariana Grande's Return
text:
Comments Grande's Chanel #2 will make an appearance in the upcoming episode as the Kappas want to communicate with her. 
Ryan Murphy wasn't lying when he said that Ariana Grande would be back on " Scream Queens ". After her character Chanel #2 was killed off earlier in the freshman season, it's hard to imagine how she would be brought back, but it's apparently not impossible on the show. Now, fans can get a glimpse of Grande's return as Chanel #2 in a preview for the upcoming outing. The promo video also teases an arrest of Dean Cathy Munsch ( Jamie Lee Curtis ), a murder plot and a funeral. An official synopsis for "Beware of Young Girls" also reveals how Grande's Chanel #2 will be part of the storyline. In an attempt to determine who the Red Devil killer is, the Kappas use a Ouija board to communicate with Chanel #2 from beyond the grave and learn of a wicked plot against one of their own. Meanwhile, Dean Munsch is left in a desperate situation when a shocking event leads her to come face-to-face with her ex-husband's mistress. "Scream Queens" will take a-week break and return with the new episode Tuesday, November 3 at 9/8c on FOX.
